title: When is double free week coming
body: title says it (for the ocean week 2016 thingo)

replies.body: You know the Ocean week yeh? I defended the city and all that but double free week, so double rotation in other words should be out. I know about double IP weekend thats not till a while but free week should be out now I think

The Champion rotation has now been expanded with the 10 extra champions! 

The expected time that each of the rewards will actually be unlocked is included in the client - some of the rewards will take some time to deliver (including the free rotation) so make sure to check out the expected times by mousing over the rewards at the bottom of the client!

Hey BanksTanks,

I'm not sure I understand what you're referring to. If you're talking about the Double IP weekend, it'll be enabled the weekend after it's unlocked.

>  It will be turned on for the first weekend after it unlocks.

http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/

If you were referring to something else, please let me know and I'll do my best to answer any questions you may have.

http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oceanweek2016/
here is the link scroll down youll see the reward
